attributes.action: accept that undersigned will not vote in any General Election until a) Members of Parliament have had their rules on expenses drawn up by an independent body and b) repaid taxpayers for all the farcical expenses they have tried to get away with.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The revelations of what MP's have been charging taxpayers for are outrageous, particularly when the rest of us have to pay for such expenses ourselves. Many of us do nor even earn the £60,000 that MP's are paid.

rejection.details: Please reword your petition to remove the word "accept" as this is not considered an action the PM can act upon.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
